subject: RE: [junit] Re: Do JUnit internals suck?!?
msgSnippet: Hi, ... I would also like to have a method Test Test::findTest( String name ) This would allow searching and accessing specific tests even if the tests are
messageBody:
Hi,

> > There is a common interface, which is the same as Test with the
> > addition of getName(), and there is the possibility of a second
> > interface to represent a composite of tests.
>
> If you add getName() to Test, then the Utility can auto-generate
> the test names.

I would also like to have a method

Test Test::findTest( String name )

This would allow searching and accessing specific tests even if the tests are nested in suites.

-- Jörg
